testcase.name: ssn, mobile number, email fileds should not except invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given Go to gmibank.com home page...........................................passed And click on login module...................................................passed And click on register button................................................passed Given User provides invalid data to corresponding fields "123-000?567", "123 456 788o", "test.com".passed And user clicks on register button at Registration page.....................passed Then user displays invalid feedback messages................................passed

testcase.name: ssn, mobile number, email fileds should not except invalid data 2
testcase.system-out: Given Go to gmibank.com home page...........................................passed And click on login module...................................................passed And click on register button................................................passed Given User provides invalid data to corresponding fields "123-000-56a", "(126)456788", "test@gmail".passed And user clicks on register button at Registration page.....................passed Then user displays invalid feedback messages................................passed
